alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 10:16PM PST until February 24 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THURSDAY TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected above 1000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. Snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches below 1000 feet and near the coast. * WHERE...Portions of northwest California. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 10 AM Thursday to 10 AM PST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
